name: Little Bear's Cleaning Crew
description:
Team up with your friends to clean with Little Bear's Cleaning Crew!

Clean up the place by picking up objects, avoiding obstacles, and dropping them in the correct color-coded regions in this 2-player couch co-op experience....and then do it all over again!

Read more about the design and build process here!

Features:

  • Local Coop: You need to be connected to the same local network to play together.  
  • Pick up, and drop the color-coded balls at the drop spots!

Controls:

  • Move your player with WASD keys
  • Pick Up Objects with the 'E' key
  • Drop Objects with the 'Q' key

Credits:

Gameplay, Network Programming, and Level Design by Sabiha Shaik

Assets Used:

  • KayKit Character Animations and Mini-Game Variety Pack by KayKit
  • Music by Olexy from Pixabay
